title: RTP Control Protocol (RTCP) Extended Report (XR) Block for Independent Reporting of Burst/Gap Discard Metrics
source: Metric Blocks for use with RTCP's Extended Report Framework
abstract:
This document defines an RTP Control Protocol (RTCP) Extended Report
(XR) block that allows the reporting of burst/gap discard metrics
independently of the burst/gap loss metrics for use in a range of RTP
applications.
